sites/all/themes/zen/layouts/two_sidebars/zen-two-sidebars.tpl.php File Reference


Variables

if(!empty($css_id)) print $content ['content']
print $content ['sidebar_first']
print $content ['sidebar_second']

Detailed Description

Template for a 1 row, 2 column Zen-based panel layout.

This template provides a two column panel display layout, with additional areas for the top and the bottom.

Variables:

  • $css_id: An optional CSS id to use for the layout.
  • $content: An array of content, each item in the array is keyed to one panel of the layout. This layout supports the following sections:
    • $content['content']: Content in the main column.
    • $content['sidebar_first']: Content in the first column.
    • $content['sidebar_second']: Content in the second column.
